title: serif font g letter curved inside
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
I think this is [Baskerville Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701111106/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/baskerville-old-face/?refby=bowfin), sometimes called Fry's Baskerville. The curled g and the shape of the 'a' are signatures of this typeface.

- Mike Yanega
